unnormalised: Employee retention is crucial, like retaining valuable Kohinoor. We, at Tata Steel, have seen great success with focused mentoring programs. Need to assess reasons for attrition – are our KRA's aligned? A feedback session is scheduled on 26/01/2024 at 14:00 hrs. Also, consider employee well-being. Diwali bonus review on 01/11/2023. Let's aim for >90% retention by 31/12/2024!
normalised: Employee retention is crucial, like retaining valuable Kohinoor. We, at T A T A Steel, have seen great success with focused mentoring programs. Need to assess reasons for attrition – are our K R A's aligned? A feedback session is scheduled on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty four at two P M. Also, consider employee well-being. Diwali bonus review on first november two thousand and twenty three. Let's aim for greater than ninety percent retention by thirty first december two thousand and twenty four!
